name: One Eye
description:
Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2019

In war every man counts, even those with ONLY ONE EYE!

When the army started recruiting everyone, they should have known they would get hurt. But they never expected them to shoot their own eye out in boot camp! Remember, NEVER LOOK DOWN THE BARREL!

How to play:

  • Half the eyes = Half the screen
  • Survive
  • WASD / Arrow keys to move
  • Space to Shoot

This game makes use of the following Assets/Packages:

  • Unity's Post Processing Stack v2
  • Unity's NavMesh Agents
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/toon-soldiers-ww2-demo-85702
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/historic/world-war-1-pack-74843
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/terrain-tools-sample-asset-pack-145808
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/weapons/hq-ammunition-pack-free-67810
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/3d-game-props-61815
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/war-fx-5669
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/zombie-30232
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/creatures/free-zombie-character-sounds-141740
